"G1700717003110" and "V1.1" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. This device is presumed to be a [[PRO-NETS WPE81RL]]. The FCC ID of that device has been assigned to this entry. ==Links of Interest== [http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?s=4fd1d7a09dbc00c3196fd746d6c63bc8&p=10461412 lspci dump] 
02:00.0 Network controller: RaLink RT2860 Wireless 802.11n PCIe
    Subsystem: RaLink Device 2860
    Flags: bus master, fast devsel, latency 0, IRQ 17
    Memory at feaf0000 (32-bit, non-prefetchable) [size=64K]
    Capabilities: 
    Kernel driver in use: rt2800pci
    Kernel modules: rt2860sta, rt2800pci
